summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Tamilnadu Textile Exchange landing page. All sections, animations, responsiveness, and interactivity working perfectly.

design_issues.issue: Google Form URL is still placeholder 'https://forms.google.com/your-form-url'
design_issues.note: Expected for demo - buttons correctly open Google Forms login page

passed_tests: Hero section loads with background image and headline 'TAMILNADU TEXTILE EXCHANGE'
Stats bar displays all 4 values: 15 people, 12 days, South India, $4,500
Sticky navigation with TTE logo and Apply Now button
All 3 Apply buttons (hero, nav, final CTA) are clickable and open new tabs
Target Audience section with 'Ideal Participants' and 'Not For' cards
Core Promise section with 4 cards (Pricing, Supplier, Production, Independence)
What Actually Happens section with mill visit list (5 items)
Why Not a Tour section with 4 distinction points
Program Snapshot with stats grid (4 items)
Academic Section for professors and students
Application Process with 3 steps
Final CTA section with Apply button
Footer with copyright text
All required data-testid attributes present
Framer Motion scroll animations working properly
Mobile responsiveness (390x844 viewport)
Tablet responsiveness (768x1024 viewport)
Industrial color scheme with orange accents applied
Typography with Oswald headings and Space Mono body text
Background images loading correctly with grayscale filter
action_item_for_main_agent: Replace placeholder Google Form URL with actual form URL when ready for production. All functionality is working correctly.
